entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Hart Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:55 AM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hart Island 03:00 AM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023
Temperature: -4.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 61 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -11.3°C
Wind: ENE 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 28 February 2023
